sense.name: classifying
sense.commentary: ASSESSMENT[+event] The act of classifying, judging, or appraising things, often with respect to their value.
sense.examples: The British government published the results of its risk assessment. An assessment of the car's value will take place tomorrow during the inspection. I performed an honest assessment of the candidates. He was working for the Office of Strategic Assessment.

sense.name: amount of money
sense.commentary: An actual value that is assigned to something. Can be a metaphoric value.
sense.examples: The assessment of the cost of repairs is approximately a thousand dollars. Your assessment is a thousand dollars off! I gave John a poor assessment of his future as a playwright.
